bibl.title: O.Col. inv. 1366. A Coptic Prayer from Deir el-Bahri with a Quotation from Tobit 12:10.
Bulletin of the American Society of Papyrologists

bibl.note: O. Col. Inv. 1366 (= LDAB 109213). Quotation from Tobit and several additional lines which may be a prayer. Deir el-Bahri, 6th or 7th c. AD. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Rachel Mairs, O.Col. inv. 1366. A Coptic Prayer from Deir el-Bahri with a Quotation from Tobit 12:10.
